NRRI Recruitment 2025 - Walk-in-Interview for 05 Agriculture Field Operator Posts
Prasanna / All Government Jobs / Jul 31, 2025, 10:21 IST
 Indian Council of Agricultural Research
 5 Jobs |  Posted On : 31-Jul-2025 |  Odisha |  Salary : 21,000 to 21,000




FOLLOW

The National Rice Research Institute (NRRI) has released the latest job notification for 2025. To fill up the Vacancies for 05 Agricultural Field Operator Jobs. Those candidates who have qualified in the 10th Pass, 12th, and ITI can utilize this chance and apply for the NRRI Recruitment 2025. Here, we mentioned the age limit, selection process, salary structure, education details, application fee, and how to apply for these posts. Interested and eligible candidates should attend the walk-in interview at the given address. For more details, visit the official website.




If you are looking for more, here is a list of Government Jobs in 2025 that you can all apply for. Use this link for more jobs in Odisha.

NRRI Recruitment 2025 - Eligibility Criteria
Name of the Posts	No.of Vacancies	Qualification
Agricultural Field Operator 	05	10th Pass, 12th, ITI

Age Limit for the NRRI Recruitment 2025

The minimum Age Limit: 18 years.
The Maximum Age Limit: 50 years.

Selection Process for the NRRI Recruitment 2025

Interview

Salary Structure for the  NRRI Recruitment 2025

The Minimum Salary: Rs. 21,000 /- per month

Application fee for the NRRI Recruitment 2025

There is no application fee.
How to Apply for the NRRI Recruitment 2025
Visit the official website.
Go to the recruitment or career page.
Check for the Agricultural Field Operator Jobs 2025.
Read the notification carefully.
Check the eligibility Criteria.
If you meet the eligibility criteria.
Then, attend the walk-in interview along with the documents required to the address given below.

Venue

CENTRAL RICE RESEARCH INSTITUTE, Cuttack (Odisha) 753 006

Important Dates

Date of Walk-in-Intrview	20-08-2025

 

Official Notification	Click Here

Join on Telegram	Join Now
